title: Expose Brain backend API contract via /api/contract
summary: Implement a centralized API contract JSON for the Brain proxy backend with a GET /api/contract route and a reusable module holding the contract object.

endpoint.purpose: Return a machine-readable contract describing the Brain proxy API.

notes: If compatibility mapping exists for an endpoint, include maps_to strings.

acceptance_criteria: GET /api/contract returns HTTP 200 and includes the required top-level keys.
Contract object is defined in a dedicated module and imported by the route handler.
Endpoint entries include maps_to when compatibility paths exist; no secrets are present.
A basic test/smoke check covers the contract endpoint and required keys.
